A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A new Star Wars for a new generation of snowflakes and social justice warriors. 

To sum up Star Wars: The Last Jedi:

Have you ever been driving down the road when all of a sudden some ass hole runs a red light and cuts you off. You swerve to miss the car that decided the rules do not apply to them. You are now pumping a vast amount of adrenalin into your body. First fear then anger floods your mind. You pull back onto the road and away from the guard rail you almost ran into. You look up at the car that almost killed you to see if the person driving would show embarrassement or even a apologetic wave and all you see is a 20 something year old flipping you off.

The Last Jedi is kindof like that.

Aside from all that I give it 2 stars because the effects and sound were great.
